Posts.Content: MissBennett06 wrote: Hello everybody I’m 30 years old and currently 20 weeks pregnant... well for the past two weeks I’ve been having issues with my breast ... first I put hair extensions in my hair which rested on my right breast which caused my breast to become itchy and irritated so I thought I was allergic to the hair so I removed them and everything went back to normal .. one day getting out the shower I notice it was a bump beside my nipple ring so I squeezed it and white stuff came out I continued to clean it but I thought maybe it wasbecoming infected so I took them out I googled my symptoms of course it all bought up breast cancer so I focused on my left breast checking for lumps and discharge everytime I went to the bathroom insane I know...well yesterday I keep messing with it until it appeared swollen I completely freaked out this morning it seems to be back to it’s regular size but it is some pain that’s in my left breast which began when I keep checking it the left breast feels heavier then the other and denser. I can’t tell if I have a lump it doesn’t feel like it more so just swollen breast tissue would be the best way to describe it. I have a doctors appointment Thursday with my OB and definitely will have her check things out. I’m just trying to keep calm until then. Thanks for listening. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Maybe I’m worried too much? MissBennett06 MissBennett06
